name: snoring
content:

noisy breathing while you are sleeping: I could hear snoring coming from the bedroom. What is the best snoring remedy?
More examplesFewer examplesSnoring disturbs others trying to sleep.Snoring might seem normal, but it can indicate many problems.I listened as her breathing assumed the slow rhythms of sleep, that familiar sound in her nose that teeters on the edge of snoring.
